message:
**Gotokal Raate hoye gelo arekti 'OPERATION Search LIGHT'.**
71 e ei operation korechilo Pakistani Hanadar bahini..
R kal korlo amader Rokkhi, nijeder takay posha nijossho Hanadar bahini...

Desh Shadhin hoyni, Hoyeche Hat bodol..!
Tai, Poradhin deshe Shovabotoi Poradhin e achi..!

Ei hocse amader Prokrito JOY BANGLA...!!

PROTIBAD janabe Gotorate gonohare khun howa Shudhui LASHER MICHIL...!

Tader k hotta kora hoyeche...! Shamne hoyto Amader Pala...!

Odur vobisshote hoyto ei protibad janabe
Amader e LaShER Michil...!

1matro Allah e parem ei Lasher michil thamate..!
Allah, amader Rokkha korun, buddhi din, Hedayet dan korun...
Aameen...!

fan post
